mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deli(delino, orderno, ddate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(delino), 0) + 1 as delino FROM deli), #{orderno}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT delino, orderno, delivery, ddate FROM deli ORDER by delino ASC
